subject: Re: @before is called for every @Test
msgSnippet: Hi, I m testing database insertions and updates, I think it s acceptable to use repeated behavior for several tests. @beforeclass solved my problem, thank you
messageBody:
Hi,

I'm testing database insertions and updates, I think it's acceptable
to use repeated behavior for several tests.

@beforeclass solved my problem, thank you very much for your help

Best regards,
Simao Mata


--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Buddha Buck" <blaisepascal@...> wrote:
>
> On Dec 6, 2007 2:10 PM, simao_mata <simaomm@...> wrote:
> > Hi,
> >
> > I'm having a problem using a test suite with several test cases.
> >
> > One of the TestCases has a @Before method, and multiple @Test methods.
> >
> > The problem is that the @Before method is called before every single
> > @Test.
>
> That is it's documented behavior, and what I, at least, want and expect.
>
> >
> > How can I solve this?
>
> Rewrite your tests so that they are more independent?
>
> If you really need to do setup before an entire class, there is the
> @BeforeClass and @AfterClass annotation.
>
> >
> > Here is the TestSuite I'm using:
> > http://paste.uni.cc/17736
> >
> > And the TestCase I'm referring to:
> > http://paste.uni.cc/17737
> >
> > Thank you for your help,
> >
